text: 2.11-12: FG 20.312.11-12: Fi 1.27; Kor 1.10; 2 T 1.9; 1 Pi 5.10Nde kaŋgi, nza ndia won tara mbui tɨvara nde muuŋgi. Nza mba tɨvar nde mbuav, nde ndɨkndɨgi khavav, nden ndavi havhari bunira nde suaŋgi. Nza nde nzuav, nza Fhe Bakɨme guigira vuzvugi tɨvi zɨn ŋgɨr zav nde suaŋgi. Fhe Bakɨme mba tɨvara zɨn ŋgɨr zav nden kamgi. Mba tɨvara, nde Fhe Bakɨme wo gumgi gu mbigi garim, mbe ana piin ki, ŋgu Hevenan ŋgirgɨp, nde mpirmpirɨgar vhuun muuŋgirga.
